DOC.brief_summary: This study examines the cardiac effects (effects on the heart) of administering donepezil and begacestat together to healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Coadministration of Begacestat And Donepezil
DOC.criteria: Healthy Men and women of nonchildbearing potential Non smoker or smoker of <10 cigarettes per day and able to refrain from smoking during study 1850 years old Any significant cardiovascular, hepatic, renal, respiratory, gastrointestinal, endocrine, immunologic, dermatologic, hematologic, neurologic, or psychiatric disease. Cardiac rhythm abnormalities Family history of cardiac risk factors
